title: Revert "Use rowid instead of id"
message:
Revert "Use rowid instead of id"

Instead, will use "id intEGER primary key" in the database to make id an alias
for rowid, which preserves backward compatibility.

This reverts commit 69a2806654c294c3ee3a9bffaca10791a7d9c437.
